argument.name: part
argument.description: 'G', 'S', 'D' - indicates the Grid part (Search, Grid, or Detail View) from which data should be submitted.

argument.name: xbasicFunction
argument.description: the name of the Xbasic function that will handle the callback.

argument.name: callbackURL
argument.description: this parameter is almost always set to a blank string. It can be used to specify the URL you want to call to handle the callback. For example, you could call a .php, or .asp page to handle the callback. If this value is not blank then the setting for xbasicFunction is ignored.

argument.name: additionalData
argument.description: a Javascript string of name/value pairs, separated by '&', of additional data you want to submit to the server. For example 'data1=value1&data2=value2'

page.description: Does an Ajax callback to a server.
page.discussion: Does an Ajax callback to a server. Data from the current row is submitted to the server. It is recommended that you use Action Javascript to write the code for you. Use Action Javascript to write the code for you. Grid Component
